sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useMutation, useQueryClient } from 'react-query'; import axios from 'axios'; import { FiSave, FiSettings, FiMail, FiDatabase, FiSecurity, FiGlobe } from 'react-icons/fi'; import toast from 'react-hot-toast'; const AdminSettingsPage = () => { const queryClient = useQueryClient(); const [settings, setSettings] = useState({ siteName: 'Media Gallery', siteDescription: 'A modern media gallery application', allowRegistration: true, requireEmailVerification: true, maxFileSize: '10', allowedFileTypes: 'jpg,jpeg,png,gif,webp', smtpHost: 'smtp.gmail.com', smtpPort: '587', smtpUser: '', smtpPassword: '', maintenanceMode: false }); // Update settings mutation const updateSettingsMutation = useMutation( async (newSettings) => { const token = localStorage.getItem('token'); const config = token ? { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` } } : {}; const response = await axios.put('http://localhost:5000/api/admin/settings', newSettings, config); return response.data; }, { onSuccess: () => { queryClient.invalidateQueries('settings'); toast.success('Settings updated successfully'); }, onError: (error) => { toast.error(error.response?.data?.message || 'Failed to update settings'); } } ); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value, type, checked } = e.target; setSettings(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: type === 'checkbox' ? checked : value })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); updateSettingsMutation.mutate(settings); }; return (
{/* Header */}

System Settings

Configure system-wide settings and preferences

{/* General Settings */}

General Settings

{/* User Registration Settings */}

User Registration

{/* File Upload Settings */}

File Upload Settings

Comma-separated list of allowed file extensions

{/* Email Settings */}

Email Settings

{/* System Maintenance */}

System Maintenance

When enabled, only administrators can access the system

{/* Save Button */}
); }; export default AdminSettingsPage;
